FuncDef:
The lock command locks a global address pool.
The undo lock command unlocks a global address pool.
By default, a global address pool is not locked.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If some IP addresses in a global address pool need to be reclaimed, run the lock command to lock the address pool.
Prerequisites
After the lock command is used to lock a global address pool, the public IP address of the global address pool is no longer allocated to users.
Configuration Impact
After the lock command is used to lock a global address pool, the public IP address of the global address pool is no longer allocated to users.
Precautions
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
